comment: The new update (I don't know if it's only me) but I can't play songs. When I click on a song I have to skip through a playlist WITHIN the one song. Also when I make a playlist there's 2 section where its; songs I added and songs spotify added. It's become really annoying because now I can't even enjoy the app I used to like. Please remove that spotify, it's honestly the most useless update you have ever added
key sentence: Key words: play songs, playlist, songs I added, songs Spotify added, useless update
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Search Playlist', 'description': 'Search item in playlist.'}, {'name': 'Create Playlist', 'description': 'Create a new playlist'}, {'name': 'Show Grid View', 'description': 'Switch to grid view'}, {'name': 'Play', 'description': 'Start playback of the currently selected item'}, {'name': 'Item Added', 'description': 'Indication that an item has been successfully added'}, {'name': 'View recently played tracks', 'description': 'View recent items'}, {'name': 'Liked Songs', 'description': 'View liked songs'}, {'name': 'Podcasts', 'description': 'View podcasts Playlist'}, {'name': 'Artists', 'description': 'View Playlist by artists'}, {'name': 'Downloaded', 'description': 'View downloaded items'}, {'name': 'Sort or Change View Mode', 'description': 'Change sorting options or view mode'}, {'name': 'Now Playing Bar', 'description': 'View the currently playing track'}]
